import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-donor-signup', templateUrl: './donor-signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./donor-signup.component.css'] }) export class DonorSignupComponent { bloodGroups: string[] = ['A+', 'A-', 'AB+', 'AB-', 'B+', 'B-', 'O+', 'O-']; conditions: string[] = ['None', 'Diabetes', 'Blood Pressure', 'Heart Problem', 'Any Other']; }
